name: Kurage, a jellyfish simulator
description:
Help the jellyfish escape the deep sea caves!

Kurage is an experimental game prototype where you control each of the jellyfish's tentacles individually in order to move. In the same vein as QWOP, you must have synchrony and timing to move gracefully and effectively.

Avoid the traps and look for your way out through a tight cave system.

---

The purpose of this prototype is to experiment with non-traditional controls, and trying to find a flow-like state of movement, similar to the care-free movement of jellyfish in the sea. Movement is more indirectly decided by the player and driven by the physics of the game world.

---

Assets  mostly made by me, except for sound effects (from freesoundeffect.net) and the font.
